Package org.dapper.event

A package for Dapper control events.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ControlEvent
    Defines a Dapper control message.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddressEvent
    A subclass of ControlEvent for conveying an InetSocketAddress by which a client may be contacted.
    BaseControlEvent
    An implementation of ControlEvent that can be subclassed into user-defined events.
    ControlEventHandler<C extends org.shared.net.Connection>
    A subclass of XmlHandler specialized for handling ControlEvents.
    DataEvent
    A subclass of ControlEvent for requesting and receiving data.
    ErrorEvent
    A subclass of ControlEvent for carrying errors.
    ExecuteAckEvent
    A subclass of ControlEvent for conveying an acknowledgement of successful execution.
    FlowEvent<F,N>
    An event class for notifying subscribers of changes on Flows and FlowNodes.
    FlowEventBroadcaster
    A mechanism for broadcasting FlowEvents from the Dapper server to multiple subscribers in a thread-safe way.
    ResetEvent
    A subclass of ControlEvent for resetting the server/client to an inactive state.
    ResourceEvent
    A subclass of ControlEvent for carrying Resource information.
    StreamReadyEvent<C extends org.shared.net.Connection>
    A subclass of ControlEvent for carrying ready input/output streams.
    TimeoutEvent
    A subclass of ControlEvent for delivering timeouts.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ControlEvent.ControlEventType
    An enumeration of ControlEvent types.
    FlowEvent.FlowEventType
    An enumeration of FlowEvent types.
    SourceType
    An enumeration of Dapper Source types.

Package org.dapper.event Description

A package for Dapper control events.
